document_title: Menorrhagia: Causes, signs, treatment and prevention
subsection_content: Normally, menstruation lasts 3-5 days. If menstruation lasts more than 7 days, it is called menorrhagia. However, the length of time for each person will be different, depending on the cause of the disease
subsection_title: rong kinh.json. How long does menorrhagia last?
subsection_data:
rong kinh.json. How long does menorrhagia last?
Normally, menstruation lasts 3-5 days. If menstruation lasts more than 7 days, it is called menorrhagia. However, the length of time for each person will be different, depending on the cause of the disease
